lines.text: Maybe we could... check the bullet hole to see who actually ended up with a bullet inside them.
Who we can absolutely rely on to tell us the truth about what she finds.
And who definitely hasn't already removed the bullet so we wouldn't be able to tell.
Yeah? Well, then- how about you do your job? Get to inspectin' the bodies!
I- I, uh... certainly. Just- just give me some time to prepare my equipment...
...But until she decides to be ready, we can't figure it out that way?
Not unless you want to stick your hand in their guts, nope.
